amendment.description: Amendment requires Federal agencies to comply with the requirements in public law and an Executive Order that deal with instituting energy efficiency improvements in Federal buildings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Gordon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
